thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice Hotel
thread.title_full: Nice Hotel - Review of Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kokkie71
title: Nice Hotel
text:
Good hotel, with clean rooms and friendly staff. Good beds and enough choice for breakfast. Typically Premier Inn. Very close to Tower Hill and at walking distance to public transport (DLR, Metro) to get you anywhere in London.
As for any hotel in London, the prices are higher than you expect for this type of hotel, but that's life in the big city. This hotel is much better than the hotels from a different brand located around the same area...
Room Tip: They have rooms located below street level. So asking for a room at a higher level will certainly be... See more room tips
